mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_operation_settlement_fixed (tosf_section, tosf_tab_id, tosf_price, tosf_price_unit) VALUES (#{tosf_section},#{tosf_tab_id},#{tosf_price},#{tosf_price_unit});
INSERT INTO tb_btcrti_table (btcrt_id, btcrti_interval, btcrt_price, btcrt_price_unit) VALUES (#{btcrt_id},#{btcrti_interval},#{btcrt_price},#{btcrt_price_unit});
INSERT INTO tb_btcobopbill_table (bbt_table_id, bbt_interval, bbt_bill_price, bbt_piece_price) VALUES (#{bbt_table_id},#{bbt_interval},#{bbt_bill_price},#{bbt_piece_price});
mapper.select: select * from tb_btcobopbill_table where bbt_table_id = #{tbid} order by id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_btcobop_num_tables (bnts_id, bnts_interval, bnts_interval_unit, bnts_price,bnts_discount) VALUES (#{bnts_id},#{bnts_interval},#{bnts_interval_unit},#{bnts_price},#{bnts_discount});

INSERT INTO vas_value_added_service_detail (vasd_id, vasd_tab_id, vasd_section, vasd_section_unit, vasd_value, vasd_value_unit) VALUES (#{vasd_id},#{vasd_tab_id},#{vasd_section},#{vasd_section_unit},#{vasd_value},#{vasd_value_unit});
INSERT INTO tb_btcobop_num_table (bnt_id, bnt_interval, bnt_price, bnt_discount) VALUES (#{bnt_id},#{bnt_interval},#{bnt_price},#{bnt_discount});
INSERT INTO tb_obopbill_tobtb (obt_table_id, obt_interval, obt_price,obt_discount) VALUES (#{obt_table_id},#{obt_interval},#{obt_price},#{obt_discount});
INSERT INTO tb_btcobopbill_discount_table (btcbd_id, btcbd_interval, btcbd_price) VALUES (#{btcbd_id},#{btcbd_interval},#{btcbd_price});
INSERT INTO tb_btcobopbill_discount_table2 (btcbd2_id, btcbd2_interval, btcbd2_price) VALUES (#{btcbd2_id},#{btcbd2_interval},#{btcbd2_price});
mapper.delete:
delete from tb_operation_settlement_rule where id in
#{item}
